review: The Amazon Fire replaced a Roku (1st generation).  Another member of my family replaced the same 1st gen Roku with a Roku 3 and saw no reduction in buffering delays and also no noticeable difference in picture quality.  Based on that experience I opted for the Fire.  Absolutely no regrets.  Picture quality is excellent and I have yet to have one occurrence of buffering delays when streaming.  The UI is nice, it has the apps that I need.  Voice search, where enabled, works well.I'd recommend this over a Roku 3 hands down.
